title: "Improve search accuracy with Spell Checker in Amazon Kendra"
excerpt: "Amazon Kendra is an intelligent search service powered by machine learning. You can receive spelling suggestions for misspelled terms in your queries by utilizing the Amazon Kendra Spell Checker. Spell Checker helps reduce the frequency of queries returning irrelevant results by providing spelling suggestions"
